exm.mng: only, sole, variant of 唯一[wei2 yi1]
to imitate to perfection, to be remarkably true to life
for fear that, lest, also written 唯恐
motivated by a desire to see the world in chaos, lest all under heaven's not in chaos and disorder
exm.pyn: wéi kǒng tiān xià bù luàn

exm.mng: to lie prostrate, to prostrate oneself (in veneration)
variant of 思維|思维[si1 wei2]
variant of 恭維|恭维[gong1 wei5]
variant of 唯利是圖|唯利是图[wei2 li4 shi4 tu2]
